qas.question: What is the name of Bern's airport?
What is the name of the regional airport?

context: Bern is also served by <a0_0>Bern Airport<a0_0/>, located outside the city near the town of Belp. The regional airport, colloquially called <a1_0>Bern-Belp or Belpmoos<a1_0/>, is connected to several European cities. Additionally Zürich Airport, Geneva Airport and EuroAirport Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg also serve as international gateways, all reachable within two hours by car or train from Bern.
